summary.para: Exposes methods that enable inspection and manipulation of columns in the Windows Explorer Details view. Each column is referenced by a structure, which names a property.

remarks.para: This interface can be accessed even when the Windows Explorer window is in a non-column view mode such as icons, thumbnails, or tiles. It affects those views, as well as views in which the column header control displays the set of columns to which IColumnManager provides access.

The default implementation of the Windows Explorer view object, created by , supports this interface retrieved through . Code that runs in the Windows Explorer (such as view callbacks, context menus or drop targets) can access the view object using IServiceProvider.QueryService, querying for SID_SFolderView.
